Ranveer Wins Best Actor For Padmaavat, Leaves Wife Deepika Teary-Eyed With His Emotional Speech
Ranveer Wins Best Actor For Padmaavat, Leaves Wife Deepika Teary-Eyed With His Emotional Speech
They say true love is when you want to see your better half grow and achieve all that he/she wants in life. To be just standing beside him/her and seeing him/her beaming with happiness is a feeling out of this world. Isn't it?
As they say, your life changes when you fall in love, we see the same happening with much-in-love couple Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh, who are now man and wife.
Twitter
At the Star Screen Awards yesterday, Ranveer Singh was awarded Best Actor’s trophy for Padmaavat. Being the happiest man he is after his wedding with Deepika, he couldn’t control his emotions as he came on stage to accept the award.
While thanking everyone, he couldn’t stop gushing over his “queen” Deepika Padukone. Confessing his love and revealing how his life has changed after she became a part of it, he made Deepika shed tears of happiness.

“Film main mujhe Rani nahi mili ( I did not get the Queen in the film), but in real life, I have got my Queen… Baby, I love you, pichhle 6 saal main maine kuch bhi achieve kiya hai, kyunki aap ne mujhe grounded rakha, centered rakha, thank you for everything and I love you.”
Take a look!
Ranveer Singh dedicated his win to his late grandmother who passed away earlier this year. He also thanked Sanjay Leela Bhansali for giving him the opportunity to play Khilji in Padmaavat.
Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone, may you remain happy forever!
